forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
